csts_uiid ,
ref_cstuiid ,
csts_precstsuiid ,
csts_title ,
csts_tasktype ,
csts_opetype ,
csts_clicktype ,

#{cstuiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{precstsuiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

insert into con_soft_task_step ( csts_uiid , ref_cstuiid , csts_precstsuiid , csts_title , csts_tasktype , csts_opetype , csts_clicktype , csts_agmodel , csts_agcount , csts_movesize , csts_pagemodel , csts_desp , csts_state , csts_submitdata , csts_predelay , csts_aftdelay , csts_ingoresta , csts_extracount , csts_iffinish , csts_moveto , csts_sort ) values
( #{item.uiid} , #{item.cstuiid} , #{item.precstsuiid} , #{item.title} , #{item.tasktype} , #{item.opetype} , #{item.clicktype} , #{item.agmodel} , #{item.agcount} , #{item.movesize} , #{item.pagemodel} , #{item.desp} , #{item.state} , #{item.submitdata} , #{item.predelay} , #{item.aftdelay} , #{item.ingoresta} , #{item.extracount} , #{item.iffinish} , #{item.moveto} , #{item.sort} )
mapper.update:
update con_soft_task_step
ref_cstuiid = #{cstuiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
csts_precstsuiid = #{precstsuiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
csts_title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
csts_tasktype = #{tasktype,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
csts_opetype = #{opetype,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
csts_clicktype = #{clicktype,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
csts_agmodel = #{agmodel,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
csts_agcount = #{agcount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
csts_movesize = #{movesize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
csts_pagemodel = #{pagemodel,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
csts_desp = #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
csts_state = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
csts_submitdata = #{submitdata,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
csts_predelay = #{predelay,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
csts_aftdelay = #{aftdelay,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
csts_ingoresta = #{ingoresta,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
csts_extracount = #{extracount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
csts_iffinish = #{iffinish,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
csts_moveto = #{moveto,jdbcType=CHAR} ,
csts_sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where csts_uiid = #{uiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select * from con_soft_task_step where csts_uiid = #{uiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} for update

select count(*) from con_soft_task_step where 1=1
and csts_uiid like CONCAT('%',#{uiid},'%' )
and ref_cstuiid like CONCAT('%',#{cstuiid},'%' )
and csts_precstsuiid like CONCAT('%',#{precstsuiid},'%' )
and csts_title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%' )
and csts_tasktype like CONCAT('%',#{tasktype},'%' )
and csts_opetype like CONCAT('%',#{opetype},'%' )
and csts_clicktype like CONCAT('%',#{clicktype},'%' )
and csts_agmodel like CONCAT('%',#{agmodel},'%' )
and csts_agcount like CONCAT('%',#{agcount},'%' )
and csts_movesize like CONCAT('%',#{movesize},'%' )
and csts_pagemodel like CONCAT('%',#{pagemodel},'%' )
and csts_desp like CONCAT('%',#{desp},'%' )
and csts_state like CONCAT('%',#{state},'%' )
and csts_submitdata like CONCAT('%',#{submitdata},'%' )
and csts_predelay like CONCAT('%',#{predelay},'%' )
and csts_aftdelay like CONCAT('%',#{aftdelay},'%' )
and csts_ingoresta like CONCAT('%',#{ingoresta},'%' )
and csts_extracount like CONCAT('%',#{extracount},'%' )
and csts_iffinish like CONCAT('%',#{iffinish},'%' )
and csts_moveto like CONCAT('%',#{moveto},'%' )
and csts_sort like CONCAT('%',#{sort},'%' )

select * from con_soft_task_step where 1=1
and csts_uiid like CONCAT('%',#{uiid},'%' )
and ref_cstuiid like CONCAT('%',#{cstuiid},'%' )
and csts_precstsuiid like CONCAT('%',#{precstsuiid},'%' )
and csts_title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%' )
and csts_tasktype like CONCAT('%',#{tasktype},'%' )
and csts_opetype like CONCAT('%',#{opetype},'%' )
and csts_clicktype like CONCAT('%',#{clicktype},'%' )
and csts_agmodel like CONCAT('%',#{agmodel},'%' )
and csts_agcount like CONCAT('%',#{agcount},'%' )
and csts_movesize like CONCAT('%',#{movesize},'%' )
and csts_pagemodel like CONCAT('%',#{pagemodel},'%' )
and csts_desp like CONCAT('%',#{desp},'%' )
and csts_state like CONCAT('%',#{state},'%' )
and csts_submitdata like CONCAT('%',#{submitdata},'%' )
and csts_predelay like CONCAT('%',#{predelay},'%' )
and csts_aftdelay like CONCAT('%',#{aftdelay},'%' )
and csts_ingoresta like CONCAT('%',#{ingoresta},'%' )
and csts_extracount like CONCAT('%',#{extracount},'%' )
and csts_iffinish like CONCAT('%',#{iffinish},'%' )
and csts_moveto like CONCAT('%',#{moveto},'%' )
and csts_sort like CONCAT('%',#{sort},'%' )
order by csts_sort asc

select * from con_soft_task_step where 1=2
or csts_uiid like CONCAT('%',#{uiid},'%' )
or ref_cstuiid like CONCAT('%',#{cstuiid},'%' )
or csts_precstsuiid like CONCAT('%',#{precstsuiid},'%' )
or csts_title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%' )
or csts_tasktype like CONCAT('%',#{tasktype},'%' )
or csts_opetype like CONCAT('%',#{opetype},'%' )
or csts_clicktype like CONCAT('%',#{clicktype},'%' )
or csts_agmodel like CONCAT('%',#{agmodel},'%' )
or csts_agcount like CONCAT('%',#{agcount},'%' )
or csts_movesize like CONCAT('%',#{movesize},'%' )
or csts_pagemodel like CONCAT('%',#{pagemodel},'%' )
or csts_desp like CONCAT('%',#{desp},'%' )
or csts_state like CONCAT('%',#{state},'%' )
or csts_submitdata like CONCAT('%',#{submitdata},'%' )
or csts_predelay like CONCAT('%',#{predelay},'%' )
or csts_aftdelay like CONCAT('%',#{aftdelay},'%' )
or csts_ingoresta like CONCAT('%',#{ingoresta},'%' )
or csts_extracount like CONCAT('%',#{extracount},'%' )
or csts_iffinish like CONCAT('%',#{iffinish},'%' )
or csts_moveto like CONCAT('%',#{moveto},'%' )
or csts_sort like CONCAT('%',#{sort},'%' )
order by csts_sort asc
